title: Print paths to response files in message
body:
It would be really nice if this message were parameterized instead of always saying `MSBuild.rsp`. It should print the (possibly multiple) response files considered.

```
Some command line switches were read from the auto-response file "MSBuild.rsp". To disable this file, use the "/noautoresponse" switch.
```

nodes.body:
It would also be nice if it logged this statement rather than [write it to the console](https://github.com/Microsoft/msbuild/blob/cc9cc0c54454d427b12d73255b950908894ed10e/src/MSBuild/XMake.cs#L2081) for debugging.

I attempted to implement it but the message is written to the console before any loggers exist..
